name: eSudo
tagline: A graphical sudo tool written in python and elementary
body:
eSudo - a GUI sudo tool written in Python.

![alt text](http://i.imgur.com/yuAPXZkl.jpg "eSudo") 

Depends:
- python-efl
- python-pam
